entries.meaning: (of a function) Such that the image of a sum is at most the sum of the images of the summands.
examples:
The square-root function is subadditive under addition because 
  
    
      
        
          
            a
            +
            b
          
        
        ≤
        
          
            a
          
        
        +
        
          
            b
          
        
      
    
    {\displaystyle {\sqrt {a+b}}\leq {\sqrt {a}}+{\sqrt {b}}}
  
.
